scripts.deploy:staging: yarn install && yarn build && gcloud run deploy lootbox-server --memory 1024Mi --service-account firebase-adminsdk-7izc8@lootbox-fund-staging.iam.gserviceaccount.com  --impersonate-service-account stamp-cloud-run-306@lootbox-fund-staging.iam.gserviceaccount.com --project=lootbox-fund-staging --update-env-vars NODE_ENV=staging
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn install && yarn build && gcloud run deploy lootbox-server --memory 1024Mi --service-account firebase-adminsdk-2b3ho@lootbox-fund-prod.iam.gserviceaccount.com  --impersonate-service-account sa-stamp-cloud-run@lootbox-fund-prod.iam.gserviceaccount.com --project=lootbox-fund-prod --update-env-vars NODE_ENV=prod --region=asia-southeast1
